page.title: 10Mining
page.content: At this present moment in time there is no mining of any sort taking place within this area.However in the area in the recent past there have been sites of opencast mining,drift mining and deep shaft mining.Within close proximity to the area there are currently sites of opencast mining being worked.There was a large opencast site working up to 2 years ago but since then the land has been filled in and returned to its original use,that of grazing land.In Ramshaw beside the river Gaunless,is the site of a drift mine,which has been worked in the past but is not being worked now.There are millions of tons of coal around that area but the proximity of the river means that the workings become flooded and it has become uneconomical to work the pit.
